summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of the north 52 feet of Lots 1, 2, and 3 and the north 52 feet of the west 10 feet of Lot 4, Block 33 of Pontiac Addition and the northeast quarter of the east half less the west 50 feet of Track 4, Earl J. McLaughlin Addition; with respect to Use Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto one new section numbered 2-359.
